website_summaries.verdict: It's effective and lower in price than some other choices, though the need to frequently reset it can frustrate some people.
pros: Pads easily adhere to the body
Lower in price than some other choices
cons: It has a maximum run time of 15 minutes, which some users find too short

customer_reviews.title: Father tested, Mechanic approved.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Fathers Day gift for my hubbers. He's a mechanic in a very busy shop and constantly complains about his back and shoulders hurting him. The second he opened this gem up he hand me help him stick the leads all over him to find just the right spots. He LOVED it and has used ot several times since. I would 100% recommend this to others who might be very physical or have a job that requires bad or strange posture. I would submit a photo but he refused to take of his grilling apron and put down his beer. 😳😂
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Truly horrible. Not strong enough!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item cause it was truly bad. I ended up buying a different one and loved it. This one is not strong enough. I prefer one that charges with a cable instead of using so many batteries. The screen also doesn't light up. I use this before I go to bed so it was a pain trying to see the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: not as advertized on the box. Supposed to have received xtra pads and batteries but not enclosed. Not so good.
customer_reviews.author: philstat

customer_reviews.title: Weak current and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cheap, large and doesn’t put out much power. Unfortunately because it’s a personal product I won’t return it
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item December 2016 and used it twice. I removed the batteries and stored it in a cool dry place. Yesterday (August 2018), I installed new batteries and it would not work. Nothing, no display.
customer_reviews.author: Larry L.

customer_reviews.title: Great until it stops working
customer_reviews.text: My love hate relationship with this. This is the second one I’ve bought, thinking maybe I just didn’t take care of the last one very well... However, the same thing happened to both within months! The battery compartment: the batteries seem to always has leakage problem, and I know people say it’s due to lack of usage. However I use it every other day and it still happens. I’m beyond puzzled, but I’m moving onto another company and hoping I’ll have better results. The product itself does work as described. Not much special, it just tends to go bad quickly. (First time, one size of the machine stopped working).
customer_reviews.author: Ng

customer_reviews.title: I feel it is helping
customer_reviews.text: This tens unit is perfect for me right now. I just finished six weeks of physical therapy, and I hurt worse. My back has ruptured discs which are affecting my left hip and knee. The sciatica is brutal. They used a large tens unit only twice on me there. After using this tens unit at home for the past few days I can see how I will need to continue using it for some time. I do the stretch exercises faithfully, lost twelve pounds, but still I am in pain. If this doesn't give more relief, the next step is injections. I had them five years ago and helped greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: After a long day/week at work, I tend to hold my stress in my back and neck, this product is a godsend for people suffering aches and pains and muscle stiffness. I love this product so much, I tell my friends, my family, my coworkers to order this immediately! I hardly have time to go to chiropractor/massage therapist, this is the best option for those suffering muscle stiffness and needs a quick fix. Also, I will note, make sure it is on 0 (lowest setting) when you turn it on, make sure to ease into the next level. Read instructions! Great product, 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Vega

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have been getting TENS treatments at our physical therapy and was asked if we had on at home. I had no idea they were so inexpensive. Read reviews on several and this was recommended in a review for a different brand for a great starter unit. Only complaint is that it doesn't seem to have the steady pin-prick type setting like at PT. It is either tap-tap which can be sped up or slowed, or massage/knead (separate settings but can't tell a difference). Has plenty of power as we haven't set it much more than 2-3 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: NotFooled

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with this product. It is large and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product. It is large and cumbersome and isn't as adjustable in settings as I would prefer. Save your money on this one folks.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and portable
customer_reviews.text: This TENS unit is good. It is the first one that I have had but it helped my shoulder and neck when I was having major issues. The only downside is I feel that the control options are a bit limited. You cannot just the time the unit goes for. Instead you have to turn the unit off and then turn it back on to start another round. There is a speed option on there but I have not noticed a difference when I use it. The modes for specific body parts are a little strange but I suppose they may work for some. Overall I satisfied and would recommend to someone unless they found a cheaper unit.
customer_reviews.author: LMSunshine

customer_reviews.title: trouble on this end
customer_reviews.text: This new unit was used only once and the batteries got so hot you could not hold the unit. we turned it off and called last Friday for tech help. You were closed for the weekend and the lady we spoke with took all of our info and said tech help would contact us on Monday, July 1st. did not happen. HELP!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly effective massager!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit after having TENS treatments at my chiropractor's office. I was happy to see that this small unit delivers the same massage as the commercial ones used by doctors. Although it's powered only by 4 AAA batteries, it is powerful - of the 10 intensity settings, I usually don't go over 3. The device comes with only two sets of electrode patches, and even though they can be used more than once I'll be ordering more of those soon. Overall, this is a really useful and effective little machine!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of practice to get the placement just right but once I do it works great. Reduces my shoulder pain greatly. I bought the TENS gel to help with the longevity of the pads. Customer service is wonderful, was missing a part and they mailed it immediately. _minus 1 star because the numbers and display are hard to read unless its in a bright room.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Herndon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: After going to physical therapy for tendinitis and carpal tunnel, I wanted to continue some to take care of my arm. This tens machine is very easy to use, I use it with ice packs while I take breaks during the day, followed with just a hot pad to loosen back up before I use the arm again. Don’t use lotion on the area in which you use the adhesive pads for the tens machine, it will make the adhesive less sticky. I’ve been using this tens machine for two months and I’m still using the first set of adhesive pads.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and the ease of how it works. However, the glue on the pads is very sticky. It also leaves a residue on my skin. When I tried to take the pad off of my skin (hip area) it actually hurt because I had to pull so hard to take it off. I would still recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: San

customer_reviews.title: Relief!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After taking a long trip with my wife and uncle to the north shore of Minnesota(2015), the days of driving took their toll. Stiff back, neck pain, the usual. Personally, I have only gone to a chiropractor three times previous to this and he used one of these units along with a heating pad to loosen up my muscles. My uncle happened to have his unit with him and let me try it. After only 5 minutes, I could feel it begin to work and bring relief. With 20 minutes of use, my back and neck were 85% better. I recommend getting one of these units to help with your back issues, where NSIDs don't/won't work.
customer_reviews.author: J. Z. K.

customer_reviews.title: Four years and still works
customer_reviews.text: Four years and I’m still actively using it. True, the pads aren’t so great that came with it but you can buy it and replace the pads easily. I have weak ankles and seem to sprain them once a year, so having this device at home speeds up the recovery. Plus, I also use it for arthritis in my feet and my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick in MN

customer_reviews.title: Good intensity, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for the first time. It comes with 8 batteries and you only need 4, but one of mine was actually dented, so it was good there were extras. I used the joint feature for my first time. I cleaned my skin with witch hazel and then rubbing alcohol to get all dirt off my skin so the pads will last longer. What i learned, make sure the left pads re on the left leg, etc. Makes it much easier to increase/decrease intensity. When you are all hooked up, go slowly up the numbers of intensity. I jumped to fast and WOW! it got to intense. I look forward to using it on my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Pray

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is very nicely done and the literature is concise and all in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am pleasantly surprised with the quality of the product in relation to the price. The packaging is very nicely done and the literature is concise and all in plain English (it doesn't contain a massive journal with five different languages). It came with two sets of four electrodes and two sets of four batteries (it requires 4 AAA batteries). The device is not heavy duty, but very acceptable and easy to use. I have tight shoulder and back muscles due to teeth grinding/stress so I'm not dealing with a major pain issues (light/medium duty device is fine). I really like the settings selection and the 15 minute timer.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk - one side totally stopped working after less than 10 uses. And there is no power after about a minute on both sides now, despite putting in new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jedi

customer_reviews.title: A drug free alternative to pain that works!
customer_reviews.text: When you have a sore area, or your back is actually hurting, this tens unit will let you go about your business with relatively little or no pain. I had pain in my lower back that was a 10 on the 1-10 scale. When I applied the electrodes on my back, the pain was immediately disrupted. After a couple of days, the pain was almost gone. This was after 5 trips to a chiropractor. I keep it with me just in case, and have gifted 2 units.
customer_reviews.author: Carla  Cross

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful
customer_reviews.text: We have had this TENS unit for over a year and it awesome! My husband gets neck pain and this helps him so much. I had a really painful knee for a while and one night decided to stick this on all sides of my knee. I turned it on and let it while I watched Watch What Happens Live (so about a 1/2 hour) the next day the pain was gone and never came back. Even I think, well, this may be coincidence, but I don't know, it really seemed to help. Just based on my husbands love for it I can highly recommend on of these to anyone who has back muscle pain. Shipped quick too
customer_reviews.author: L Mitch

customer_reviews.title: WORST DESIGN EVER
customer_reviews.text: SO FRUSTRATING! Never have I ever had such maddening reaction to a gadget - it works, BUT the design is TERRIBLE. Truly awful, actually CRUEL. It's a huge gadget, like a big tv remote, only works in 15 minute increments & 2 SUPER LONG cords, so you're carrying around a giant tv remote & 2 long jump ropes! Horrid. I'm ordering a different TENS because the frustration level is agonizing.
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Works and Feel good.
customer_reviews.text: This works. It works just like the one the chiropractor uses on me. But I still returned it. I felt like I would stop using it because I didn't want to manage they sticky pads. You can use the pads maybe up to 5 times and then you have to buy the gel or new pads. It just seemed like too much work. I already have bits and bobs and accessories for everything in my house - I just didn't need one more thing with accessories to keep track of. I am trying to downsize the crap in my house. Still it works. And it does feel great. I don't have anything bad to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptical Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Connecting leads have become loose in as little as 2 months.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the benefits of this product but unfortunately after only having it for a little over 2 months the input for the leads don't seem to connect very well (I was concerned about this from the moment I placed them into the unit because they didn't seem to have a snug fit like most all other devices with these types of connections. Therefore I only give this 3 stars because I am already having issues with the connection and I find myself having to constantly figdet with the connections to get a good contact and without the contacts seated correctly it will not work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Works! But replacement pads can get to be a sizable investment, and quick!
customer_reviews.text: The TENS machine is a great little device to relax cramped or stiff muscles. I notice significant relief when I use this thing on about half strength for about 15 minutes at a time. It does work pretty good for me! Downside is that the pads that deliver the stimulation get worn out and don't stick well after only a few uses. You will need to commit to purchasing more pads in the future, and pretty often, if you plan to use the machine with any real frequency.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Swift relief!
customer_reviews.text: This little device really packs a punch! My sister purchased this first, and after using hers, I was in awe. It is battery operated, but don't let that fool you, it will light you up! I recommend starting out with the lowest setting and working your way up to see what is most comfortable for you. This is as effective as the electric systems that were used on me at my chiropractor's office (after a car accident injury), and the batteries surprisingly last a long time. I fully recommend this product, as it has saved me from having to go to my chiropractor as often, which in turn has saved a ton of money! It is an absolute godsend!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie P.

customer_reviews.title: Stop Pain in its Tracks
customer_reviews.text: So far I have purchased four of these units. One for myself and three more as gifts for family members and friends. I highly recommend it to others who are interested in this type machine. The only recommendation I have is that larger pads be included. I purchased 2x4 and butterfly pads to cover larger areas of pain quicker. I'm very happy with my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Duck Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe, Need further instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of good reviews here but, for me the unit is underpowered ( nothing more than a tickle). Maybe I'm doing something wrong but, to see the instructional video, I have to provide my name and email which I'm not doing.
customer_reviews.author: El Ex

customer_reviews.title: Great for minor aches and pains
customer_reviews.text: Man, I love this thing. I occasionally have back pain and it helps get rid of some of the kinks I have. The pulses/beats are as strong or soft as you can handle. I recommend starting off slow though and working your way up to some of the mid to upper levels. I've used it on my knee and back which are usually my problem areas. You will need to buy gel to go on the pads eventually or just replace the pads themselves for usage to be effective. Oh and the unit came with batteries, but they were DOA. I recommend this unit for minor aches and pains.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Teach

customer_reviews.title: Gifted
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift to a friend. This is a machine similar to what they use in physical therapy. She has regular ongoing pain, so this is a very function gift. Great for her to use in between sessions at PT. As far as what I have heard, no problems with using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy for the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was not sold on this, however, fatigued with a combination of nerve/muscle pain from the lower back I purchased the item. Excellent quality, easy to understand, operate, and provides me temporary relief particularly when strong pain episode occurs. Simply being careful, that is having clean skin when applying the pads, returning the pads to the clear storage sheet, and keeping the component parts together either using the box or a small plastic bin makes this easy to keep bedside and at reach. Happy I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anne D. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Does not function
customer_reviews.text: I try to use it with spotty success. The trouble-shooting section of the patient information booklet states that if the unit fails to operate, there must be some problem with the electrical connection. It suggests that the user check the cables and re-insert the batteries. I tried both with no success. At first it appeared that the if batteries were moved around, that resulted in a one-time only success. Now nothing I try works. I am so disappointed that the 30 days has expired. I cannot recommend this appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Tavares

customer_reviews.title: It works well to relax muscles.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts about this gadget but having used it for a few days, I see that it works and really provides a benefit. I was suffering from neck and shoulder pain for a period of a week. I'd gotten a massage, been taking Motrin, and using pain creams but nothing was really working. I ordered this, used it for two days (several times in a row), and canceled my chiro appointment. Some of the massage sequences are more like zaps or taps - I don't think I like those. But the "kneading" function is very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Dorn

customer_reviews.title: But I'm making an exception with this because I am extremely pleased with this item
customer_reviews.text: This gadget doesn't need another positive review, as it has so many! And I am not one to review products because I don't make time to do so. But I'm making an exception with this because I am extremely pleased with this item! It arrived practically overnight, superb packaging and instructions, It was easy to quick start, too! Extra batteries, extra pads.....and it absolutely does the trick. I am confident it will expedite the healing of the back strain I experienced when I lifted something that was much too heavy. I will also use this routinely for other aches and soreness that I've begun to feel now that I am entering my "golden" years.
customer_reviews.author: elissa

customer_reviews.title: Great unit at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second unit I have purchased because my husband and I like them so much. I have even taken it to work . I put the unit in my jeans pocket and place the pads in the appropriate spots so I can get relief from shoulder, neck or back pain throughout the day. Catching the pain early and perhaps running up to three/15 minute sessions will often eliminate the pain completely. I still like to go to a chiropractor occasionally but I don't often pay for him to use his tens unit. I can save money over time that way. I recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It does the job for me
customer_reviews.text: This unit is my first venture into the world of TENS units and it does the job for me. I suffer with unbearable muscle spasms in my right leg and the right side of my back. I have been on muscle relaxor medication but tired of taking medication. I use this unit in the evenings and do two treatments on my calf, 2 treatments on my right knee and 1 treatment on my lower back. Using this unit has cut my need for mediation remarkably and I have not suffered with leg cramping since starting my treatments. I am thrilled with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: pnkfuchsia

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the $40
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered post-operative back pain for yesrs, Recently, this has been paired with a new shoulder condition. Copays being what they are, I desperately searched for a product that would do the job but not turn out to be a cheap piece of junk. Found it: it's this one. For the money you will not find a better TENs unit. Only my RX-8000 is better at relaxing my muscles, and that's because it's a several hundred dollar piece of equipment. The truMedic is portable, wjich has been a plus as recently as today - great for vacations, is what I'm trying to say. Just buy the thing. You won't regret it...
customer_reviews.author: QuackJak

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn't work, pads may be defective
customer_reviews.text: I had a problem which is the TEMs only worked if I pressed down on the pads against my skin. I tried two different pads from the same card which contained 4 pads and the problem was still there. I called TEMs support and it didn't make sense to them. While talking to them I tried 2 pads from the other card containing 4 pads and it worked fine without having to press down. So, the moral or the story is that if it doesn't seem to work then try the pads from the other card (you get two cards with 4 pads on each card.)
customer_reviews.author: G. Schenck

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea this product was out in the world, until one of my employees brought it to work. She had back pain.. I have gone to chiropractic and of course they use the pulse machine....It did some research and this product had the best reviews...it to received on time....it to have stress in my shoulder and after two uses I feel relaxed and the pain has subsided will continue to use this product.....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Started using the unit the day it arrived. It is very easy to use and very effective on tight muscles. Use alcohol swabs to wipe the skin before applying the adhesive pads. This removes the oils from the skin and the adhesive pads last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I must of gotten one that was either not working ...
customer_reviews.text: I must of gotten one that was either not working right, or I was the one not seeing well, as I cannot see through the blue colors, wishing it had LED light, so I am returning it and I am going to purchase the PRO one which cost an awful lot more, but I want to make sure it works right so I can see....even with my glasses, its too hard to see and I'm sure by this, was why I think I could not make this machine work as intended. Im retired and I do have aches and pains in my foot after a surgery for plantar. thankyou ! was well packed, efficient and the remote is light ......
customer_reviews.author: Iphonelover2011

customer_reviews.title: It was annoying that once you had it on a setting you ...
customer_reviews.text: The TENS Unit was not strong enough. The settings were on a timer and once they stopped you had to turn it off and turn it back on. It was annoying that once you had it on a setting you couldn't easily go back and change it. You would have to turn the whole thing off and then change to a new setting. The stickers were not very sticky just after a few uses. One of the pads didn't work. Overall, I'm very disappointed with this product. I would recommend spending your money on a better TENS Unit. Don't waste your money on this. You will also have to buy new pads very frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Lesanna Dahlen

customer_reviews.title: Good overall buy, not a fan of the joint setting
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly effective. I kept getting knots in my lower neck and back between my spine and shoulder blade. You know the knot where you can turn your head one way fine but the other requires you turn your whole upper body. Lol. This was surprisingly effective at quickly removing that knot and allowing me to avoid muscle relaxers. The only thing I don't like is the joint setting on this device. It's very, VERY uncomfortable and doesn't seem to help much but that may just be my view, it may work well for others. The battery lasts surprisingly well and overall this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: toodledoo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, great service when I had an issue.
customer_reviews.text: I really use this product and get great benefit from it. The adhesion can get weird,too much on some pads, wearing off after time on others, but there's a gel you can buy to get it back. When one of my leads broke 2 months in, I emailed the company and they shipped a replacement within a week. Very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Delivered Results
customer_reviews.text: We got this product after my son's baseball teammate's family raved about how effective it is for sore muscles. They used it after every game. The product is exactly as described, worked well, delivered results and the multi functions on the device is very convenient as it adapts to personal comfort level. After six months, I must admit that we have forgotten about it, not sure why, but we do not use it as often as we did in the first few months when we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Hada

customer_reviews.title: Quality control problem
customer_reviews.text: After a couple weeks, one of the power jacks failed. Good thing it has two. Other than that, don't know what I'd do without it. It's used almost every day for chronic back pain. If this one gives out completely, I'll get another though I may look for a different brand. Maybe a rechargeable model.
customer_reviews.author: J.Perkins

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: bought over a year ago and still using it multiple times EVERY week. and the included electric pads are still working great. just take the time to clean them after every use. recommended way: just damp a wash rag (if you have one in the shower thats damp from evening shows thats perfect. Just take the pads and lightly rub across the wash rag to wipe off excess oils from the pad, while it remoistens the pad from the water in the washrag.. thats it.. over a year latter and the pads are like new..
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Walker

customer_reviews.title: trumedic  no so sure
customer_reviews.text: don't count on 24/7 contacting them as there web site dose not work. This is heavy , so you can only use it laying down This item only comes with 4 very small pads 2 inch . this company must be out of business. you cannot contact them and get the warranty I have a feeling this company must be cleaning out a warehouse of their products . their site works if you want to buy more pads but no for warranty , questions ect
customer_reviews.author: michelle creek

customer_reviews.title: I preciously ordered this item and have used it to the point of wearing out the reset control and am pleased that I could find a
customer_reviews.text: As expected. I preciously ordered this item and have used it to the point of wearing out the reset control and am pleased that I could find another one. I have chronic and daily back pain related to spinal stenosis, but it is my back muscles that have become so tense and hardened, that at times I feel they have formed into bone. I use this massager almost daily and find it helps the muscles release, at least somewhat to a more tolerable level. Best if I find just the right spots to place the pads on my back. The 'sweet spot,' so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: ByTheBeach

customer_reviews.title: Great non-chemical pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have severe osteo-arthritis in my left knee. I am having total knee replacement in April 2014. The prescriptions I am given either knock me out or turn my stomach into a churning pit of hell. With this gizmo, I am able to attach the probes, choose my settings and sit back for 15 minutes. It scrambles the pain signals long enough for me to do the stretches needed to ease the pain. I even use it just before bed to help me slip off. My only problem with it is placement. It takes a few tries to get it where it needs to go. I feel the booklet could be a little more helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat helpful, but nothing like the machine that my physical therapist uses
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist had suggested that I purchase a Tens unit to help alleviate some back pain that flares up from time to time. For the price, I guess that it performs adequately. My main issue with it is that the pulses don't seem to reach the muscle level - it's more that they stay on the skin's surface. You can adjust the strength of the pulses; however, the higher levels feel more like painful shocks to me. I'm also not a fan of the pulse settings - one is like little zaps of electricity. Finally, it's very easy to bump the dials and increase the pulses to an uncomfortable setting.
customer_reviews.author: BaseballMom

customer_reviews.title: It is a TENS unit, and it does work ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a TENS unit, and it does work - but we have another smaller brand that does the same and has higher end pulses, that is they are much stronger IF you want them to be. I can set this as high as it goes and it does the job on some areas, while our other one I can only turn up about 60%. For the price I would say look at others and see their reviews before just purchasing this one
customer_reviews.author: David Diaz

customer_reviews.title: This unit lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit june 2015 or so. Now it's october 2017. I also purchased more sets of sticky pads and gel. I've only gone through one set of pads. They last a long time if you keep them clean. Anytime I have sore muscles or nerve pain as a result of tight muscles, I gel up and start shocking myself. works wonders. GET ET!
customer_reviews.author: Ediee

customer_reviews.title: Treat the wires with care!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needing physical therapy should purchase but get the one with 4 and not 2 plugins at the top for better coverage. Im amending my first review. My wires that plug into the 10s unit are not holding and I really dont know why. So to those purchasing one please take care of the wires because they start to fall out of the unit after a while and I haven't had mine a whole yr yet!
customer_reviews.author: LaVette Howard

customer_reviews.title: Rolling the dice with this One...
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest... it works but I tend to have to giggle the one output to get the right side to work... wound up purchasing a different brand that was also cheaper and am much happier that I did...
customer_reviews.author: Sven Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Love The Tru Medic Massage👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bestfriend for her birthday present. My older sister bought one a while back for neck issues. My mom also just bought one after trying my sisters. I like it for my shoulder. My friend has knee and feet problems. We both like it . You really have to be careful when adjusting the numbers. A very good quality and sturdy product and I would recommend it to Anyone dealing with pain. Great Price and Yes myself, my family and my bestfriend love this product. Amazon is also great. Great product and fast shipping.👍
customer_reviews.author: maureen simpson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this this evening and I really like it. I am sure the pads will wear out with time and you will have to buy more but it tells you that in the instruction. I put it on my lower back because I have severe facet degenerative changes and this gave me relief. I just hope it continues to do that. I thought it was very strong in fact I didn't turn above 5. For those that want to know the instructions on the first page says it is FDA approved. I will try to come back in a month and give an update.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa L.

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I've ever made. It works just as well as tens units I have used previously at a chiropractor office or in physical therapy. I do wish it had some type of a belt clip or something to it would be easier to walk around the house and do someting while I was using it. I like that it has a 15 minute timer and that you can use double leads.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Electric Pulse massager .. Eh
customer_reviews.text: This unit is definitely compact and convenient, however, it is not as versatile as I would like. For certain areas, like my neck, it is plenty strong, but for my leg cramps, not strong enough. Also, don't change strength while it is on because the strength is adjusted by a dial, and when i touch the dial while it's on, the level jumps around. Not sure if I have a unit with faulty dials, but as long as I don't touch them while its on, I'm fine. Overall, I will keep the unit since it does work well on my key areas like neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: LVMike214

customer_reviews.title: Feel better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Would have liked a nice case, but happy with price. Would like a back-lit unit, but again, happy with price. I have a smaller unit that I thought I would give to a friend once I got this. But, my smaller unit will clip to a waistband and is nice to have for discrete portability if needed while away from home. The smaller unit does not have the convenient controls and easy to read interface this one has.
customer_reviews.author: FL ArtGeek

customer_reviews.title: My only con is that the contact pads seem to lose their stickiness pretty easily which means I'll have to invest in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This Electronic Pulse Massager works wonders for my back and shoulder to help reduce inflammation or just as a massage. My only con is that the contact pads seem to lose their stickiness pretty easily which means I'll have to invest in the spray for them for continued use. I read another review that mentioned the batteries that come with it were bad so I didn't even bother using those batteries, I put my own Triple A batteries in.
customer_reviews.author: Nansense

customer_reviews.title: Great Massager
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pulse massager because this type of machine was used when I went through physical therapy. My husband and I where both rear ended in an auto accident so it loosens our tight neck and shoulder muscles. It has more features than the one I used in therapy, 3 types of pulses beat, massage and kneed. It also has a timer built in and shuts off when the session ends. It works wonders to relax tight muscles. There are some very expensive pulse massagers on the market but this one really does everything we need and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mac

customer_reviews.title: 15 minute shutoff
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very easy to use and quite effective for what I use it for, that being sore neck and shoulder muscles. Batteries are surprisingly very long-lasted in the unit. The unit has a built in shut-off after 15 minutes, and that is the only reason I am knocking off a star. I can be just about ready to doze off in a nap after 15 minutes, and it brings me to full consciousness when it automatically times off. I would be more pleased if it had a 30 minute shutoff, so that I could enjoy some snooze time!
customer_reviews.author: daSavage

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: My Fiance has been struggling with pain in his shoulder area for the past year now. He now has to go to physical therapy and that aggravates the shoulder even more and causes more pain. I read the reviews on this product and was immediately convinced. I'm so happy I made this purchase. He loves it! He kept saying how awesome it was and how it works on your muscles, etc. He's so picky too...nothing ever relieves the pain for him..except now :-) it does help him a ton. If you're thinking about buying this product...don't think. Just do it! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Paola

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I had electronic pulse therapy from my doctor a few years ago and had zero back pain for three weeks. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that I have to use it every other day or so, as it doesn't reach quite as deep as when you go to the doctor, but I expected as much when I purchased it. The best thing is that it alleviates the pain for long enough that I no longer have trouble sleeping! My lower back has been an issue for years and spending 15-30 minutes using this, I no longer have problems sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley & Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Boi this thing unbelievable i pull my back couple days after i received this and just two usage pain completely gone. Definitely beats weeks of muscle rub. Thumbs up. Also tried it on moms she was a little sceptical because she's old school but great results she told me days after it worked because she didn't want to use it and didn't want me to say i told you so Lol. Make sure to bathe before use to get any grease or sweat from the affected area. Cant believe just two use one in the night and the morning no more discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: shan303

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty good; they give you two sets of pads (8 individual pads in total) and two sets of AAA battiers, which is considerate, but I can definitely sense I didn't get the cream of the crop at this price point. This is definitely a damn good deal at the price, but I will say that it does not feel like this unit penetrates into my deeper muscles as much as I have experienced with more expensive units. So, again, since this unit did cost 1/5th of what some of the higher end units go for, it's pretty handy.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely fashion and worked correctly out of the box. I am enjoying the machine and find it beneficial for sore or tired muscles. The unit does not necessarily provide instantaneous results. I find that I often notice how much better I feel two to three hours after using the unit. It absolutely delivers therapuetic results and is plenty strong enough for my 6' 2" 200lb frame. The best results I have noticed come after using the unit on my feet. My feet just feel new about an hour after a fifteen minute session. For the price you can't really go wrong. It works for me, buy one and find out if it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: colin

customer_reviews.title: A blessing tha fits perfectly in your hand.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tend unit to replace one I bought from my chiropractor I bought 15 years ago. Wow, was I ever surprised with the advancement in the technology. It's so easy to follow the instructions, and if you have ever used one before it's a cinch to use. The only issue is that my wife tried it out on a problem area she is having with her thigh and I hardly can get it from her. Two separate packs of the 4 electrodes come with the unit so she has a set of her own. I would recommend this tens unit to all.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wish it had a backlight
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the unit. Pads seem to last about a month with very heavy use and not swabbing the area with alcohol first. Was pleasantly surprised that it came with an extra set of pads and batteries. Giving it four stars only because the intensity dials are a little sensitive... be careful when putting it in a pocket, and the lack of a backlight. Often use it in the bedroom and have trouble remembering which direction is off, or which massage pattern is which.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I have a back condition that can cause intermittent pain ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a back condition that can cause intermittent pain and I use the tens unit when it is not severe. I will put on the electronic pulse pads and stick the tens unit in my pocket and use as needed. Even my husband who thought it was some kind of voodoo/con was surprisdhen il it relieved his back pain from a pulled muscle. I admit there are times when a pain pill is needed, but this is my first defense and usually takes care of the pain if I use it off and on for a while.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Knee Bends and Squats!
customer_reviews.text: Usually would Seek Acupuncture for a Job related Injury slipping on Ice, falling on a sidewalk affecting my right knee Joint pain, especially when I Bend my Right Knee an Squat. I Just wanted to try something at Home that would stimulate Healing Energy ...The First Day notice immediate improvement , after ....Sixteenth Day...No more Aleve! I Give 5 Stars because I'm able to do Knee Bends, Squats, Shoveling Snow, Martial Arts, and Drop it like it's Hot! Totally works for me and made a Difference! Thank You so Much Deborah
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Buy gel and never turn up 2 high
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple it was I use to use this for back pain. What I dont like about it is some times it will be kept on to long and mess up your skin. But overall good product at the price
customer_reviews.author: Adam Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for tension & pain.
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research, I chose this TENS unit to help with lower back/SI joint/hip pain and it has been wonderful. Since then, I have let friends try it and two of them have also purchased this unit. In short it has helped the three of us with hip pain, carpal tunnel of the wrist, ankle joint pain from car accident, lower back/SI joint pain, stressed neck muscles and stressed back muscles. I would definitely recommend to anyone who suffers from any of these afflictions.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: love this thing
customer_reviews.text: love this thing. be careful though guys because you can seriously get nerve damage if you F around with it specially around the forearms... i didnt think it would hurt me and it did when i placed 2 patches on my forearm. and turned it high enough to where my forearm /wrist would lock up (for jokes and giggles) and for about a couple weeks my wrist would not stop twitching. but that was my fault for using it as a toy. feels awesome on my muscles since i bodybuild. but just warning everyone
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Yes - It is strong, even though it is battery operated!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond thrilled with this! I was hesitant on getting a battery operated unit, as I was worried about the strength, but this really performs!!! I bought it for my neck and shoulders, but tried it on my arthritic knee for the heck of it. It gave me immediate relief. So whenever I have flare-ups in my knee, I slap on the pads and give it a good 20 mins of stimulation. The pain goes away. Of course it returns the next time I overexert my knee, but the relief is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gochnauer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I got this after a friend gave me theirs to try and it was great. This is a handy device that helps with pain and tension from all causes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: not as powerful as I have experience with similar products
customer_reviews.text: works well but it doesn't seem to be powerful enough once you get used the levels. I am at level 10, maximum, on my knee and want to increase the power. A similar unit at physical therapy provide more stimulation at level 6. I also wish I could change the countdown timer from the default 15 minutes to 12 or 10 minutes. The pads that come with this device are small. I found a much better set of 4 pads in a package of ten (40 pads) that last several weeks, if used daily. No need for conductive adhesive gel.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R

customer_reviews.title: Great little TENS unit
customer_reviews.text: Great little TENS unit. I've had this for a while now and it still works just as good as the day I bought it. Great for sore muscles, cramps, and just relaxing (yes I said relaxing!) - I carry a lot of stress in my jaw which causes my neck and shoulders to tighten up. This TENS unit offers relief for my muscular ailments.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Improved Hubby's chronic back pain
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband when his Icy hot smart therapy broke. This works way better. I had to borrow it one day when I pulled my shoulder muscle. I used it for one complete session and the next day I was better. My husband has chronic back pain from compression fractures and bulging discs and uses this instead of medication to help with his pain. It makes a huge difference in his ability to continue doing the things he loves.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice product less powerful then a previous model and make but does the trick. Knead massage modes along with duration are nice for stimulating blood flow.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great TENS Unit...faulty pads.
customer_reviews.text: This TENS Unit is very versatile, with many settings. I had two problems with it though. 1. It could not be set for more than 15 minutes. 2. The electrodes tended to slide off the sticky part after multiple times getting in and out of my recliner, exposing my skin to direct shocks. Yes it hurt. I now have a Zewa TENS Unit that doesn't have as many settings, but It will run for 95 minutes without stopping, and the pads don't slip around.
customer_reviews.author: 1st Sgt

customer_reviews.title: Healing help from broken back!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing unit for this price point. Works as well as past experience with a chiropractors office. Easy to use, effective results, and portable. Have used primarily on lower back due to a serious burst fracture recovery. Once the brace came off, the muscles were stressed to support me causing a lot of discomfort. This tens unit has been so helpful at helping to relax these lower back muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great product you will use often
customer_reviews.text: Purchase extra pads right away because you will be using this A LOT! I have used it on Achilles tendon with amazing results - eliminated pain that I had for months in just two sessions, Using it on my carpel tunnel, getting relief that two surgeries has not fixed. Using it on tense shoulders muscles instead of paying for massages. Great value, easy to use. Every home should have one of these and it will eliminate a lot of doctor visits.
customer_reviews.author: Jas999

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I use this almost daily. For the money, these things have paid for themselves after the first use. My wife loves using it as well, and she is not a fan of massages. When the pads stop sticking, I just get them a little damp to clean, and they are good to go again. I took them on a road trip, and when I wasn't driving, I was getting a massage in the car!! The intensity level is awesome, though I hardly go over 4. I honestly can't say enough good things about this product.
customer_reviews.author: mondo cool

customer_reviews.title: and it is great! Really powerful
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today, and it is great! Really powerful, simple to use. If it holds up for the warranty period it will be worth the price. The 90 day warranty gets extended to one year if you register it within 10 days of purchase. You can order different size pads depending on what body part you are trying to sooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kactus Karl

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: I love this "massager" I would definitely recommend it to anyone who suffers from joint pain. It is not big and bulky so you can carry it around with you. Lay on the couch while watching TV or reading a book. It only takes 15 minutes a day to get relief. It helps me a lot. I suffer from severe osteoarthritis in my hips so it is very painful to walk. I find that using this does relieve some of my pain. Pain takes a lot of energy away. I find though, after using this, I have more energy when I exercise or walk.
customer_reviews.author: BroMark

customer_reviews.title: I have put my Pain medicines out to pasture for the most part because this thing is awesome. My only wish is that it came with .
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help with menstrual cramps and this persistent pain I get in my shoulder. It is very helpful on both fronts. I have put my Pain medicines out to pasture for the most part because this thing is awesome. My only wish is that it came with an additional set of pads. They wear out with regular use and I know I'll have to buy replacements soon. A small price to pay for relief.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Whipple-Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way this feels at a low level (around ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way this feels at a low level (around 4). I have used it several dozen times with the same pads with no problems. I keep the pads attached and on the plastic sheet they came on, then slip them in a plastic bag. I wash the skin first so it isn't dirty so the pads don't get dusty. You could reapply gel if you needed to. FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS! If you only put on one pad you'll get a shock - not really a shock, but it hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie B

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this unit because my mayofacial pain I had for a long time. When I received fist unit it was defective. Return was no problem and new one works great. I'm still learning how to use it and I believe it's helping. I'm sure I need to use more to get full benefits from it. It comes with 2 sets of batteries and spare pods (total of 8). I think it's great deal. Before I use to get this treatment at doctors office and it cost me $50 each. Now I can do it at home which sames me a lot of money for a long run.
customer_reviews.author: Olender

customer_reviews.title: Worked much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked much better than I expected, powerful. Helped me manage my pain from sciatica and fibromyalgia so I could take less medicine, and without this little beauty, I would not have been able to drive almost 10 hrs., to see my grandchildren. *side note-altho I wouldn't suggest this, I have countless times dropped my unit. Usually I forget I'm attached, lol. It takes a beating and is still working great.
customer_reviews.author: CleoDidit

customer_reviews.title: A shocking good time
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I bought this for my wife and she loves it -- but I love it even more, I strap the electrodes to my wrist and turn it up until my hand spasms and clenches into a ball. I sneak one onto my Wife's arm while she isn't looking acting like I'm giving her a loving caress and with one already attached to my hand I turn it on and kiss her. ZAP. This thing has me sleeping on the couch, and I still can't help myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Better than the expensive unit I had.
customer_reviews.text: Since I bought this truMedic I have discovered it is the best unit by far. I have used several different brands. The intensity is stronger, even at the lowest numbers, than the expensive one my insurance paid for. I have neuropathy in my lower legs and hardly ever feel anything except the pain episodes. Well, the truMedic pulses are felt. I will not hesitate to tell anyone about this TENS unit.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Marcia Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This product is extraordiary!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever had lower back adjustment with a chiropractor, this product duplicates the electronic pulsing finish to the treatment. It is extraordinary! You can treat almost any part of the body. Read and understand the instructions before you try it; specifically, don't use it around your chest/heart area. I use it on my lower back, neck, shoulders. My husband uses it on his legs. The product is guaranteed -- the company is very customer-friendly. Cannot say enough -- try it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Vallee

customer_reviews.title: Love using this tens machine
customer_reviews.text: Love using this tens machine, works just like the ones they use for physical therapy, my husband uses it quite often for a sore back or neck, works very well. Just don't use the cheap batteries that comes with the unit, the first one I had the batteries leaked all over inside in the first month but Amazon replaced it with a new one immediately and we only use good energizer batteries in it now and it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lentz

customer_reviews.title: Tens Unit
customer_reviews.text: Tens Electronic Pulse Unit: or ( transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation) What ever..... I like it. I'm going to try to use this; instead of DRUGS! wish me luck! Thanks so far it"s working!
customer_reviews.author: Jerome King

customer_reviews.title: finally some alleviation
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from severe lumbar pain and this has definitely helped soothe some of the pain. I also used it on my aunt's back where she was complaining of some pain as well where she couldn't even bend over to touch her toes. After two treatments she was able to somewhat bend over. My husband has also used it for his tense shoulders and he claims it's released the tension. It is also a great price, especially with the $4 coupon currently available.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy B

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: My body cannot tolerate pain meds. This TENS unit helps me manage my pain until I have the necessary surgery on my neck. i use it for hours at a time, I have not had to change the batteries yet. I am still using the original pads, though I have ordered a back-up package. This system has plenty of power, I have never gone past 4 on the pulse dial. I would highly recommend this unit to anyone experiencing pain.
customer_reviews.author: TP
